step6.title: SQL Sorguları
step6.description: Veri çekmek için kullanılabilecek SQL sorguları

queries.daily_sales: SELECT * FROM sales WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
queries.product_sales: SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) as total_qty FROM sales GROUP BY product_id
queries.customer_sales: SELECT c.name, SUM(s.total) as total_spent FROM sales s JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.id GROUP BY c.id
queries.inventory_check: SELECT p.name, p.stock_quantity FROM products p WHERE p.stock_quantity < 10
